attributes.action: stop building mosques and special schools for immigrants.
attributes.additional_details:
20 Yeats ago, we didn't have mosques or special schools for foreigners.
We  are allowing migrants to take over our homeland,  this shouldn't be allowed.
If immigrants choose to live in Great Britain then we will welcome them, 
if they respect our country and stop trying to change it to suit them
attributes.background:
Parliament please protect Great Britain and our heritage. Remember this is our home land and we want to keep this country British.
If migrants wish to live here m, then they can't expect special privileges, such as mosques when our Christian churches are dropping to bits.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for building mosques. 

We also don’t know what you mean by “special schools for immigrants” or "special schools for foreigners".
